results.name: The Bird in the woods ( The Unfinished Edition )

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 32-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo E6600 @ 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel 4400, GeForce GT 8800, AMD Radeon HD 4650
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 90 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Sound Card
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 64-bit
  • Processor: i5-2500k @ 3.3GHz AMD FX 6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750, AMD R7 370
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 90 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Sound Card
